ygData.msgSnippet: Ok. LN: There are several good reasons why people are complaining. You have been acting like you control other people s decisions and such regarding their

Subject: LN and everyone else acting like retards.
Message-ID: <3B6008E1.20785.4F8450E@localhost>
Priority: normal

From: "rAuq" <rauq@...>

Ok.

LN: There are several good reasons why people are complaining. 
You have been acting like you control other people's decisions and 
such regarding their characters. For example, you were telling Airly 
that Blacknightmare couldn't escape, and since she chose the 
wrong choice, which I will remind you was nearly impossible to get 
right (she doesn't follow your line of thinking), her character was (as 
Azure correctly put:) condemmed to death. Airly's character should 
have the ability to escape, unless she has agreed to have that 
character killed. The RPG is designed for people to have fun RPing 
their characters, not to have them killed. You don't seem to 
understand this though... and that is part of why there have been 
complaints. You also have to note that the complaints were not 
staged behind your back, Azure made it clear he didn't like what 
you were doing to Blacknightmare, Gunthers has voiced his 
opinions, frequently, as have Yanshosh and myself. Imho, it takes 
more guts to post opinions over the messageboard, than it does to 
email the privately. About your second Infecticon base: So what if 
your second base is important. That doesn't make it anymore 
important than any other RPers base, and it shouldn't, so why 
should it be so impregnable, and heavily defended? When you say 
"a great many players" you must realize that there are like 19 
active members and 'great' probably refers to several people at 
most, and I can't think of who those people might be. Gunthers 
was correct when he said that you don't seem to notice you 
problems, and that you can't give up a "talk fight". The text below 
removes proves that quite efficiently...

<<After checking I found out sunlight only reaches 100 meters into 
the ocean, which is roughly 300 feet. So if we go by what you said 
Gunthers and the decepts were "20,000 leagues under the sea" 
that means they were really fucking far down under the ocean. 
Woot, now dont you feel like the dumbass that you are gunthers? I 
thought so.>> (yah, is used your style KSL, it works well =P)

What you just said makes you sound more like a dumbass than 
Gunthers... 

Regardless, this RPG is sort of different than your RPG, so role 
play your charactesr accordingly. (btw, you still have to edit your 
profiles as decreed by council discussion) Also, last thing for this 
message, is your base setup like the G1 Decepticon Base?

This will be the last OOC post relating to this topic. Any further 
post will bring about moderation or some form of punishment to the 
poster. It IS quite possible to keep this private, and not take up 
anyone who is not involved's time. Also, if anyone replies to this 
with a BIC included the will suffer the same punishment. The 
OOC/BIC thingy was intended to keep people from posting solely 
OOC posts, not to post a one line BIC and then have a two page 
OOC. Email PRIVATELY. It is really quite simple. =)
